DOC.brief_summary: Study determine pulmonary/critical care fellows demonstrate increase competency behavioral skill necessary facilitate family meeting focus discussion goal care ICU pre- post-communication skill training .
DOC.brief_title: Communication Skills Training Competency Assessment Pulmonary Critical Care Medicine Fellows
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator hypothesize pulmonary/critical care fellows demonstrate increase competency behavioral skill necessary facilitate family meeting focus discussion goal care ICU pre- post-communication skill training .
